title: CityAtmos2 SoundEffect
description: High-quality stereo ambiance sound loop package capturing the urban atmospheres of cities in Korea, Japan, and China in Asia
longDescription:

technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 30
  • Number of Audio Cue: 30
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 27:00
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10 LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12 LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12 LU ~
  • Average Momentary : - 8 LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : -0 dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.
